root.name: Patrician III
root.description: Patrician 3 was a PC game that was released in 2003 for Windows. The game is set in the Hanseatic League.Â The game features 24 cities and a map editor for customizing a custom map. The game starts the player of as a humble merchant in their chosen hometown, the player may choose to trade with other towns, host festivals, donate money or do a number of things to get his or her reputation up. If the player wishes they may engage in illegal affairs such as piracy. Patrician 3 is a business simulation but the player may grown their business how ever they wish.
